member_organisations:
ADPA Members are: 
- Hella Gutmann Solutions A/S 
- Robert Bosch GmbH 
- TecAlliance GmbH 
- HaynesPro 
- Sator Holding B.V. 
- Autodata Ltd
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, Transport, Communication
eu_initiatives:
- Internal Market (Vehicle and component type approval legislation, Vehicle Repair and Maintenance Information) 
- Digital Single Market and Connectivity 
- Competition Policy (competition law framework for the automotive aftermarket)
organisation_name: ADPA - European Independent Automotive Data Publishers Association (ADPA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: ADPA is member of AFCAR (Alliance for the Freedom of Car Repair in the EU)
goals__remit: ADPA pursues the purpose to ensure fair access and competitive framework conditions for independent data publishers to automotive data and information to be able to design and provide competitive, innovative and multibrand products and services to operators of the automotive aftermarket to enable competitive choice to motoring consumers and businesses in the care of their vehicles.
